"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5547d8a363687235152a0600#post_5547d8a363687235152a0600
My step father was a rapist pedophile.

Most of the time I just keep my mouth shut about my past cause whenever I legitimately talk to people about my depression it makes them depressed as well.  Before someone goes, "you can talk to me about it" I've been getting help from a lot of people.  2010: I was so far gone that I would just stare at the walls for hours and people wouldn't touch me cause if you touched any part of my skin I would flip out and try to smash your face into the wall.  2015: I just once in a while get depressed.

And I just depressed everyone didn't I?

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5547dcda6368723567e20100#post_5547dcda6368723567e20100
Not to get religious or such, but the dude got what he deserved and if god does exists then he sure punished the dude.

Last time I saw my ex-step father he looked like a husk.  He only weights like 80 pounds now (he's like 6' 5"), *BUT* he is in perfect health.  He medically has a good forty years left in him.  If you're that fucked up physically to the point that you literally look like a skeleton with skin on you, can barely function but you have forty years left in your life that's a hell of a punishment.  The guy is either going to live out the rest of his life barely functional or he's going to wind up killing himself cause he can't take it, but chances are he's not going to kill himself for a while cause if he dies his mom loses her income (my ex-step dad was military and received retirement or whatever it's called) and his mom has a good 20 years left.  So conservatively speaking he has to live another 20 years as a borderline cripple and can't kill himself cause if he does kill himself before his mom dies then she loses her source of food.

If god does exist he brought the pain hammer down hard.
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5547ded963687253e1330300#post_5547ded963687253e1330300
Okay; let's talk about something else then.
